title: What about Ranked ARAM?
body:
All champions available regardless of what you own, no rerolls.

HARDCORE.

Be a Jack of all Trades Master of Nuns.

Nun shall stop me!

replies.body:
Along with the champ availability and rerolls mentioned, there's a few other things that should possibly be tweaked for ranked ARAM. Stuff like  placements, promos, bans, and at what summoner level the queue unlocks.

Specific implementation details aside, ranked ARAM would be a great addition to League.

Summoner level 42.
Placements are from Gold to Challenger because you're awesome for just playing ARAM!
Promos gives you 3 more poro snax during those games. 
You are banned if you refuse to feed the poros.
